content:
Has anyone seen this error while trying to ./x.py test the current master (actually, I've had this issue for a few days now)?

Compiling chalk-solve v0.32.0 thread 'rustc' panicked at 'index out of bounds: the len is 4067 but the index is 4067', /home/dani/rust/compiler/rustc_serialize/src/opaque.rs:240:21
Do you have incremental enabled? If so try removing the incremental caches.
Hmm, I don't think I have it enabled, but a clean did solve this. Thanks!
Side note: a full x.py test is almost never what you want, they take forever and CI will run them anyway.
